title: Average GIM TI

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Grant a player Powerful defense.
- Roleblock a player.
- Deal a basic attack to a player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may not use an ability again until you have used all other abilities.
- If you kill a Town member, you lose your killing ability.
- Roleblock immune
- __**Part of the Daily Streak Faction**__ - If part of the DSF, you do not lose your ability after killing a Town member, and all abilities have a 1 night cooldown instead of being locked until all other abilities are used.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Kill all who oppose the Town.
